TopicTitle: Just going to leave this here... [Curiosity landing perspective]

Articles.Content: I am aware that we're all bored with Curiosity and Mars by now what with this having been more than a few weeks ago but I just stumbled upon this video and well... It is going here for obvious reasons.
uhhh... I don't see your obvious reasons for showing us this, I've watched the whole video and not one reference to KSP.
I believe this should be moved to the space lounge.
Yeah, Lounge it is, it would have been in the Science Labs but the lacklustre way Reicht presented it precludes that
